Room.Name: Pearl Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Pearl Avenue, between the Grand Cathedral and the Town Hall.
Room.LongDescription: The Kista Town Hall is on the east side of the Avenue. Although the true leaders of Kista hold offices in the Towers, There is a mayor and a council who handle the day-to-day business of running the city. Kista is a very democratic city, and everyone can come to the Town Hall and be heard, if they have an opinion. The Grand Catheral is west of you.
